name: node-tri-pack
author: superyaoser <yaoserpro@163.com>
description: 将Node.js项目打包为独立可执行文件！支持Windows EXE/macOS App/Linux

scripts.webpack:prod: npm run clear && cross-env RUNNING_ENV=prod webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.webpack:dev: npm run clear && cross-env RUNNING_ENV=dev webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.sync:create: npm run create:into-prefix && npm run create:npm-pack && npm run create:models-zip && npm run create:dist-dir && npm run create:blob
scripts.build:external-win: npm run sync:create && npm run init:app-win && npm run into:blob-win
scripts.build:external-linux: npm run sync:create && npm run init:app-linux && npm run into:blob-linux
scripts.build:external-mac: npm run sync:create && npm run init:app-mac && npm run into:blob-mac
scripts.build:this-prod-win: npm run webpack:prod && npm run build:external-win
scripts.build:this-dev-win: npm run webpack:dev && npm run build:external-win
scripts.build:this-prod-linux: npm run webpack:prod && npm run build:external-linux
scripts.build:this-dev-linux: npm run webpack:dev && npm run build:external-linux
scripts.build:this-prod-mac: npm run webpack:prod && npm run build:external-mac
scripts.build:this-dev-mac: npm run webpack:dev && npm run build:external-mac
